FCEU-Next @pretty_version@ Port of FCEUmm / FCEUX to Libretro. FCEUX is a NES, Famicom, and Famicom Disk System (FDS) emulator. The concept behind FCEUX is to merge elements from FCEU Ultra, FCEU rerecording, FCEUXD, FCEUXDSP, FCEUXDSP CE, and FCEU-mm into a single branch of FCEU.
